name: Spelldiver
overview: Three underwater word-recognition games for readers age 6 and up. Spelldiver is an underwater word adventure. You become a diver who explores the ocean floor to find and uncover giant words hidden by a strange seaweed called lettermoss. The more quickly you identify secret words, the higher your score. Pesky flipper-nippers and sharp-toothed shark try to thwart your exploration. Divers can choose from thousands of words as simple as three-letter teasers or as challenging as ten-letter stumpers.
